product_name: REI Sahara Long-Sleeve T-Shirt - Men's Tall
long_description: Last year we made the fabric in the REI Sahara long-sleeve T-shirt lighter. Customers and staff, though, asked for the original Sahara and we listened. And now ... Introducing the "new" old Sahara. Polyester fabric has a soft cottonlike feel and is designed to draw moisture off of skin while you're logging miles on the trail; fabric dries quickly. With a UPF 15 rating, fabric provides good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Rolled-forward shoulder seams enhance comfort while wearing a pack. The tall REI Sahara long-sleeve T-shirt has a classic fit that's cut just right for easy wearing.
short_description: Last year we made the fabric in the REI Sahara long-sleeve T-shirt lighter. Customers and staff, though, asked for the original Sahara and we listened. And now ... Introducing the "new" old Sahara.
